name: Krossa [VR]
description:
Krossa is a small game about smashing vases with a baseball bat in virtual reality.

To run the game you need a web browser with WebVR/WebXR support such as the newest versions of Firefox, Chrome or Oculus Browser. You also need a VR headset with 6DoF controllers such as the HTC Vive, Valve Index, Oculus Rift or Oculus Quest.

If you get a security error you can also play the game on my website: https://www.kodub.com/apps/krossa
